message.entry: When setting ''EntryPoint'' to a non-empty value, it must match one of the files packaged by ''compiler.package.docker''.

In order to use ''{0}'' you must be able to run in MATLAB:

system(''docker version'')

and it should return zero.

In order to use ''{0}'' you must be able to run in MATLAB:

system(''docker version'')

or

system(''wsl docker version'')

and it should return zero.
Image ''{0}'' does not exist in the local repository.
ImageName cannot start with any of the following: {0}\n
Values provided for ImageName and RuntimeImage must differ.\n
Invalid ''compiler.build.Results'' object. ''compiler.package.docker'' and ''compiler.package.DockerOptions'' can only be used with the output of ''compiler.build.standaloneApplication''.
